item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Sanyo (三洋) Logo Sanyo Electric Co., Ltd. (三洋電機株式会社 San’yō Denki Kabushiki-gaisha) (stylized as SANYO) was a Japanese major electronics company and formerly a member of the Fortune Global 500 whose headquarters was located in Moriguchi, Osaka prefecture, Japan. Sanyo had over 230 subsidiaries and affiliates. Sanyo was founded by Toshio Iue. Source
You can download the Sanyo logo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Sanyo
item.description: Sanyo Electric Co., Ltd. (三洋電機株式会社 San’yō Denki Kabushiki-gaisha) (stylized as SANYO) was a Japanese major electronics company and formerly a member of the Fortune Global 500 whose headquarters was located in Moriguchi, Osaka prefecture, Japan. Sanyo had over 230 subsidiaries and affiliates. Sanyo was founded by Toshio Iue. Source
